title: Transcriptome analysis reveals PRKCA as a potential therapeutic target for overcoming cisplatin resistance in lung cancer through ferroptosis
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Ting Sun, Penghua Zhang, Qingyi Zhang, Binhui Wang, Qitai Zhao, Fenghui Liu, Xiaohua Ma, Chunling Zhao, Xiaolei Zhou, Ruiying Chen, Songyun Ouyang
